safety_precautions: Wear a dust mask when sanding

steps.description: Clean the damaged area with a damp cloth to remove any dirt or dust.
Use a putty knife to apply wood filler to the scratched area. Let it dry according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Once the filler is dry, sand it smooth with sandpaper. Wipe away any dust with a tack cloth.
Use a paintbrush to apply a matching wood stain to the repaired area. Let it dry.
After the stain is dry, apply a clear finish to the entire leg to seal the repair and match the rest of the chair.

tips: For best results, allow the wood filler, stain, and finish to dry completely between steps.
Always sand in the direction of the wood grain to avoid additional scratches.
